item.title: Mother Goose
item.description: The Mother Goose Nursery Rhymes are a collection of poems, riddles, and stories that originally were used as tools to educate, remind, or even scare children into a pattern of thought or behaviour. Although the origin of many, if not most of the rhymes, is impossible to determine, their content frequently refers to a specific historical event(s) or societal ill that has no obvious relationship to the starry-eyed innocence we often associate with childhood.
item.content:encoded: The Mother Goose Nursery Rhymes are a collection of poems, riddles, and stories that originally were used as tools to educate, remind, or even scare children into a pattern of thought or behaviour. Although the origin of many, if not most of the rhymes, is impossible to determine, their content frequently refers to a specific historical event(s) or societal ill that has no obvious relationship to the starry-eyed innocence we often associate with childhood.

item.title: Doku Typeface
item.description: Doku is a monospaced-rounded, display typeface, inspired form an organism. "Doku" means "tissue" in Turkish. Format Open Type Glyphs 357 Style 2, Weight 7 Supported Encodings 1252 Latin 01 Western European 1250 Latin 02 Eastern European 1257 Baltic 1254 Turkish Machintosh Character Set Supported Languages Afrikaans, Albanian, Basque, Bokmål, Bosnian, Breton, Catalan,Cornish, Crotian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Esperanto,Estonian, Faroese, Finnish, Friulian, Gaelic (Manx), Gaelic (Scottish), Gagauz (latin), Galician, German, Hawaiian, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Irish, Irish Gaelic, Italian, Karelian, Ladin, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxemburgish, Maltese, Moldovian (latin), Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Rhaeto-Romanic, Romanian, Sami, Serbian (Latin), Slovak, Slovenian, Sorbian, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Turkish, Welsh.
item.content:encoded: Doku is a monospaced-rounded, display typeface, inspired form an organism. "Doku" means "tissue" in Turkish. Format Open Type Glyphs 357 Style 2, Weight 7 Supported Encodings 1252 Latin 01 Western European 1250 Latin 02 Eastern European 1257 Baltic 1254 Turkish Machintosh Character Set Supported Languages Afrikaans, Albanian, Basque, Bokmål, Bosnian, Breton, Catalan,Cornish, Crotian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Esperanto,Estonian, Faroese, Finnish, Friulian, Gaelic (Manx), Gaelic (Scottish), Gagauz (latin), Galician, German, Hawaiian, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Irish, Irish Gaelic, Italian, Karelian, Ladin, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxemburgish, Maltese, Moldovian (latin), Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Rhaeto-Romanic, Romanian, Sami, Serbian (Latin), Slovak, Slovenian, Sorbian, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Turkish, Welsh.
